ourService_body: We use both online and offline platform to connects all local merchants to the main distributor or importer efficiently. We will leverage modern technologies and industry best practices to deliver a seamless and user-centric experience for merchants.
ProductInfo_body: Real-time product availability, pricing, and stock tracking capabilities.
InventoryManagement_body: Centralized inventory management system for merchants and the main distributor/importer.
BothOnlineAndOffline_body: Seamless integration between the online platform and existing offline systems.
OurFeatures_body: We achieve widespread adoption of the platform among local merchants, distributors, and importers, fostering a thriving and interconnected business ecosystem. Additionally, we aim to improve overall operational efficiency, optimize inventory management processes, and enhance the profitability of participating businesses.
GPSLocation_body: Merkato Sidamo Tera Building Block 1 8th floor 813
